body:
orig pixiv was 81483298. 

i wish they stayed a catgirl tho lol
Spitting shits under a hentai, how hilarious. Better think with your dong, your brain dead anyways
Noooo he didn’t keep the cat ears
nice trash
At both comments below me oddly wholesome I love it
@JaneMiller Don't worry, I was the one who lost my temper first. But i'm glad we sorted all that out.

Ok, I've done all the research, this conversation ends here. I admit, I was wrong, this doujin really was Chinese and the artist is also Chinese. I lost my cool and I probably shouldn't have insulted you. The reason I was so fixed on this being Japanese was because the sfx and 2nd panel were in Japanese. For some reason this artist uses Chinese writing but uses katakana for the sfx.
@TigaMaskman I said this proves the doujin is Japanese. Learn reading and basic english before posting.

Plz keep calm bros. Here the heroine is actually a particularly famous male SC2 commentator & streamer IRL. He's always beloved by millions of fans so the artist bends his gender and makes him everyone's dream girl, with his original behavior reserved.

@JaneMiller Oh! One-no...THREE more things. First, did you know that many of anime artists from overseas are actually know japanese so they could promote their works better. Second, while pixiv were filled with artists from all over the world, bililbili were still dominantly filled with chinese users. And lastly, This artist's pixiv account might point out that he's living in Japan but his profile commentary is obviously chinese! A chinese who working/studying in japan seems more reasonable to me. So i still stand firm that the artist who draw this wack-ass doujin is in fact, a chink!

@JaneMiller Are you kidding me? If the artist having pixiv account = Japanese now? Then having bilibili account = Chinese then you stubborn idiot, it's in the same page next to each other too! Now i'm not at all proficient in either of these languages but i bet you couldn't even differentiate sunrunes(chinese) & moonrunes(japanese). So don't try to act smart, you ignorant fool.
Wait no, I take that back, this doujin was originally japanese. The pixiv account at the last panel proves it.
The art is so inconsistent wtf is all Chinese art like this?
Bruh that warframe guy in the comments lol
@TigaMaskman My mistake, I did some research and the artist was chinese.
Gender bender? Oh lord...
Good nut cat girl sold 8/10

孙一峰永远是我大哥✖
孙一峰永远是我老婆✔
Is this from China?
Hello fellow peeps I’m just here with no user name ;-;
@JaneMiller Were you read the same doujin as me? Did you saw those sunrune titles and those chink character names? The author is obviously a chink.
@zombieadd Agreed.
Cute art but It just unfunny and shallow as hell. I bet the author is one of those basic bitch weeb IRL.
Do you see tenno around here?
@zombieadd The artist is actually japanese.
Don't know how to feel about this 5/10
Torrent error, why?? Why???!
Mantapss :v

I don't really know what to say about this. This feels so... normal. I didn't even consider this doujin a hentai at first, more like an ecchi manga that does't have any censor. Good tits tho
7/10
Aw yes political views in a hentai comment section ok
Nice.
Of course a Blizzard fan, Blizzard shit is huge in China as you can see the artist gotta be Chinese. And so we got here a mediocre Chinese story; the only redeeming goodie is the cute art.
Carbot zealot and zergling, and DVA. Artist must be a Blizzard fan.
